title: The limit of functions at same point commute
text: We see $${h{\left(x\right)}}^3$$ as h(x) times itself $$3$$ times, so we can have $$\lim_{x\to6} {h{\left(x\right)}}^3$$ by doing $$(\lim_{x\to6} h(x))**3$$

title: Coefficients of limit can be directly calculated
text: We simply divide the limit of $${h{\left(x\right)}}^3$$ by $$2$$.
